content:
A1: You can add authorized users to your card online after signing in, or you can call the number on the back of your card. However, you must be the primary cardholder, secondary cardholder, power of attorney, or account manager to do so.

A2: If you're approved for a credit card, you should receive it, along with credit limit information and welcome materials, by mail within approximately 7 to 10 business days. However, for customers approved for a Secured Mastercard card, the card will be shipped approximately 7 to 10 business days after they pay the deposit in full.

A3: You can check the status of your credit card application by calling 1-800-903-9177. If you applied by phone or online, you will often receive a response in 60 seconds, but in some cases, additional information may be needed to make a decision. Capital One will notify you in writing of their decision within 7 to 10 days of your application.
